description:
Variation of Condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission 2579/09: (for redevelopment of site for mixed use development of A1, A2, A3, C1 or B1, and 101 residential units (on floors 3-15) with associated parking and landscaping) to create  mezzanine floors between ground and first and between first and second floor to provide 26 additional hotel bedrooms,  including minor elevational alterations
MAJOR APPLICATION
decision_conditions:
Prior to commencement of the hereby-approved development on site, the applicant shall agree details of the proposed rainwater tanks and grey water recycling apparatus. The agreed details shall be installed/implemented in full and operational prior to first occupation of the premises and shall be retained thereafter.

Reason: To accord with the terms of the application and to ensure compliance with Policy BD1 of the Borough Wide Primary Policies Development Plan Document, the Council's Adopted Supplementary Planning Guidance "Sustainable Design and Construction" May 2005 and Policies 5.3 and 5.7 of the London Plan.
